00030 /* Pass */
00031 
00032 static bool compare_pass_order(const Pass& a, const Pass& b)
00033 {
00034     if(a.components == b.components)
00035         return (a.type < b.type);
00036     return (a.components > b.components);
00037 }
00038 
00039 void Pass::add(PassType type, vector<Pass>& passes)
00040 {
00041     foreach(Pass& existing_pass, passes)
00042         if(existing_pass.type == type)
00043             return;
00044 
00045     Pass pass;
00046 
00047     pass.type = type;
00048     pass.filter = true;
00049     pass.exposure = false;
00050     pass.divide_type = PASS_NONE;
00051 
00052     switch(type) {
00053         case PASS_NONE:
00054             pass.components = 0;
00055             break;
00056         case PASS_COMBINED:
00057             pass.components = 4;
00058             pass.exposure = true;
00059             break;
00060         case PASS_DEPTH:
00061             pass.components = 1;
00062             pass.filter = false;
00063             break;
00064         case PASS_NORMAL:
00065             pass.components = 4;
00066             break;
00067         case PASS_UV:
00068             pass.components = 4;
00069             break;
00070         case PASS_OBJECT_ID:
00071             pass.components = 1;
00072             pass.filter = false;
00073             break;
00074         case PASS_MATERIAL_ID:
00075             pass.components = 1;
00076             pass.filter = false;
00077             break;
00078         case PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR:
00079             pass.components = 4;
00080             break;
00081         case PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR:
00082             pass.components = 4;
00083             break;
00084         case PASS_TRANSMISSION_COLOR:
00085             pass.components = 4;
00086             break;
00087         case PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT:
00088             pass.components = 4;
00089             pass.exposure = true;
00090             pass.divide_type = PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR;
00091             break;
00092         case PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT:
00093             pass.components = 4;
00094             pass.exposure = true;
00095             pass.divide_type = PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR;
00096             break;
00097         case PASS_TRANSMISSION_INDIRECT:
00098             pass.components = 4;
00099             pass.exposure = true;
00100             pass.divide_type = PASS_TRANSMISSION_COLOR;
00101             break;
00102         case PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT:
00103             pass.components = 4;
00104             pass.exposure = true;
00105             pass.divide_type = PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR;
00106             break;
00107         case PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT:
00108             pass.components = 4;
00109             pass.exposure = true;
00110             pass.divide_type = PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR;
00111             break;
00112         case PASS_TRANSMISSION_DIRECT:
00113             pass.components = 4;
00114             pass.exposure = true;
00115             pass.divide_type = PASS_TRANSMISSION_COLOR;
00116             break;
00117 
00118         case PASS_EMISSION:
00119             pass.components = 4;
00120             pass.exposure = true;
00121             break;
00122         case PASS_BACKGROUND:
00123             pass.components = 4;
00124             pass.exposure = true;
00125             break;
00126         case PASS_AO:
00127             pass.components = 4;
00128             break;
00129         case PASS_SHADOW:
00130             pass.components = 4;
00131             pass.exposure = false;
00132             break;
00133     }
00134 
00135     passes.push_back(pass);
00136 
00137     /* order from by components, to ensure alignment so passes with size 4
00138        come first and then passes with size 1 */
00139     sort(passes.begin(), passes.end(), compare_pass_order);
00140 
00141     if(pass.divide_type != PASS_NONE)
00142         Pass::add(pass.divide_type, passes);
00143 }
00144 
00145 bool Pass::equals(const vector<Pass>& A, const vector<Pass>& B)
00146 {
00147     if(A.size() != B.size())
00148         return false;
00149     
00150     for(int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++)
00151         if(A[i].type != B[i].type)
00152             return false;
00153     
00154     return true;
00155 }

00157 /* Film */
00158 
00159 Film::Film()
00160 {
00161     exposure = 0.8f;
00162     Pass::add(PASS_COMBINED, passes);
00163     need_update = true;
00164 }
00165 
00166 Film::~Film()
00167 {
00168 }
00169 
00170 void Film::device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00171 {
00172     if(!need_update)
00173         return;
00174 
00175     KernelFilm *kfilm = &dscene->data.film;
00176 
00177     /* update __data */
00178     kfilm->exposure = exposure;
00179     kfilm->pass_flag = 0;
00180     kfilm->pass_stride = 0;
00181     kfilm->use_light_pass = 0;
00182 
00183     foreach(Pass& pass, passes) {
00184         kfilm->pass_flag |= pass.type;
00185 
00186         switch(pass.type) {
00187             case PASS_COMBINED:
00188                 kfilm->pass_combined = kfilm->pass_stride;
00189                 break;
00190             case PASS_DEPTH:
00191                 kfilm->pass_depth = kfilm->pass_stride;
00192                 break;
00193             case PASS_NORMAL:
00194                 kfilm->pass_normal = kfilm->pass_stride;
00195                 break;
00196             case PASS_UV:
00197                 kfilm->pass_uv = kfilm->pass_stride;
00198                 break;
00199             case PASS_OBJECT_ID:
00200                 kfilm->pass_object_id = kfilm->pass_stride;
00201                 break;
00202             case PASS_MATERIAL_ID:
00203                 kfilm->pass_material_id = kfilm->pass_stride;
00204                 break;
00205             case PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR:
00206                 kfilm->pass_diffuse_color = kfilm->pass_stride;
00207                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00208                 break;
00209             case PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR:
00210                 kfilm->pass_glossy_color = kfilm->pass_stride;
00211                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00212                 break;
00213             case PASS_TRANSMISSION_COLOR:
00214                 kfilm->pass_transmission_color = kfilm->pass_stride;
00215                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00216                 break;
00217             case PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT:
00218                 kfilm->pass_diffuse_indirect = kfilm->pass_stride;
00219                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00220                 break;
00221             case PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT:
00222                 kfilm->pass_glossy_indirect = kfilm->pass_stride;
00223                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00224                 break;
00225             case PASS_TRANSMISSION_INDIRECT:
00226                 kfilm->pass_transmission_indirect = kfilm->pass_stride;
00227                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00228                 break;
00229             case PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT:
00230                 kfilm->pass_diffuse_direct = kfilm->pass_stride;
00231                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00232                 break;
00233             case PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT:
00234                 kfilm->pass_glossy_direct = kfilm->pass_stride;
00235                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00236                 break;
00237             case PASS_TRANSMISSION_DIRECT:
00238                 kfilm->pass_transmission_direct = kfilm->pass_stride;
00239                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00240                 break;
00241 
00242             case PASS_EMISSION:
00243                 kfilm->pass_emission = kfilm->pass_stride;
00244                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00245                 break;
00246             case PASS_BACKGROUND:
00247                 kfilm->pass_background = kfilm->pass_stride;
00248                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00249             case PASS_AO:
00250                 kfilm->pass_ao = kfilm->pass_stride;
00251                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00252             case PASS_SHADOW:
00253                 kfilm->pass_shadow = kfilm->pass_stride;
00254                 kfilm->use_light_pass = 1;
00255             case PASS_NONE:
00256                 break;
00257         }
00258 
00259         kfilm->pass_stride += pass.components;
00260     }
00261 
00262     kfilm->pass_stride = align_up(kfilm->pass_stride, 4);
00263 
00264     need_update = false;
00265 }

00267 void Film::device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00268 {
00269 }
00270 
00271 bool Film::modified(const Film& film)
00272 {
00273     return !(exposure == film.exposure
00274         && Pass::equals(passes, film.passes));
00275 }
00276 
00277 void Film::tag_update(Scene *scene)
00278 {
00279     scene->integrator->tag_update(scene);
00280     need_update = true;
00281 }
